metadata.name: Up In Smoke #1
metadata.description:
Up In Smoke is a dynamic & interactive NFT containing a total of 9 images. The image changes every time the token is transferred, up to 8 times. You can click on the joint to reveal all the unlocked images.

This collection is not just a static piece of digital art, but a living & breathing entity that will transform every day, creating a unique and dynamic experience for each collector.
